LITTLE WOODS is an impressive directorial debut from Nia DaCosta featuring powerful performances from Tessa Thompson & Lily James. Two sisters not bonded by blood but by love, just trying to survive & get by in contemporary North Dakota. Great tension, empathy & song choices.

That's what I'm saying, when Hoffa disappeared in 1975 there would have been about twenty square miles of woods with this tooling shop right in the middle of it down the street from where they were digging for "The little tool shed" seven years ago.

That's what I'm saying, when Hoffa disappeared in 1975 there would have beenvl about twenty square miles of woods with this tooling shop right in the middle of it down the street from where they were digging for "The little tool shed" seven years ago.

Check with the Oakland County Clerk. The foundation for the structure was first poured in 1968. It was the only little tool shed in the middle of the woods back then up there for twenty-five square miles.

Yes, apparently right before they all died in prison they told the FBI th at they buried Hoffa under Jack's little tool shed at the back if his property up by where his horses were. Look, in '75 you pretty much had twenty square miles of woods and this tooling shop.

Either way, I'm terrified. They were looking for "The little tool shed" and the only place around for about twenty square miles in the middle of the woods was this tooling shop and they couldn't figure it out.

Yes, apparently right before they all died in prison they told the FBI that they buried Hoffa under Jack's little tool shed at the back if his property up by where his horses were. Look, in '75 you pretty much had twenty square miles of woods and this tooling shop.
I'm just saying, completely exonerated...these investigators couldn't even find the little tool shed and it was the only place there in the middle of the woods for twenty-five square miles. Okay?

I'm just saying, if these investigators can't find the little tool shed in the middle of the woods that the people who killed Hoffa were talking about in prison before they died then they're crooks. It was the only only place there. They probably built the whole Hazel Park track.

I feel like a stereotypical republican trying to explain to a bunch lawyers who can't understand in this day and age. In 1975 there were twenty square miles of woods and this tool shop. That's your little tool shed.
Also, they 'normally' are managed properly, but this one has been massively neglected. Partially due to cuts to funding, partially due to Bradford council's lack of care.

This weekend there are black-woman-directed-movie options. Little, Little Woods, And Fast Color. Rememadat!

LITTLE WOODS tops off my weekend. @NiaDaCosta navigates sisterhood through poverty and broken systems, and challenges us to think about the choices we land on when we have none. Tessa Thompson and Lily James are deeply affecting: tragic and resilient.

One of the many things that HER SMELL, FAST COLOR, SOMEONE GREAT, and LITTLE WOODS share that really stuck with me was how the relationships between women change. Life will put you on your path, and you can't always take those relationships with you, as much as you might want to.
